block.name: block
block.description: Blocks are regions in a template which can be overridden by child templates

blog_comments.name: blog_comments
blog_comments.description: Renders the blog comments embed tag

blog_subscribe.name: blog_subscribe
blog_subscribe.body:
blog_subscribe
	select_blog=default
	title=Subscribe Here!
	no_title=False
	response_message=Thanks for Subscribing!
	edit_form_link=

call.name: call
call.description: In some cases it can be useful to pass a macro to another macro. For this purpose you can use the special call block.

change_password.name: change_password
change_password.body:
change_password
	old_password_label=Old Password
	password_label=Password
	password_confirm_label=Confirm Password
	submit_button_text=Save password

content_attribute.name: content_attribute
content_attribute.description: Sets default content in an attribute of the content object, such as content.email_body

cta.name: cta
cta.body:
cta
	embed_code=
	full_html=
	image_src=
	image_editor=
	guid=
	image_html=
	image_email=

cycle.name: cycle
cycle.description: The cycle tag can be used within a for loop to cycle through a series of string values and print them with each iteration

do.name: do
do.description: Evaluates expression without printing out result.

email_each.name: email_each
email_each.description: Allows looping over a list value in an email where a for loop would not work. Use "item." to access the current element of the list.

email_flex_area.name: email_flex_area
email_flex_area.description:
An email flexible area tag is a widget container which renders its contained widgets in a box grid, 
with an email friendly table-based layout.

The layout schema is defined in a JSON structure at the content level; these tags are always empty
in their declaring templates.

email_simple_subscription.name: email_simple_subscription
email_simple_subscription.body:
email_simple_subscription
	header=Email Unsubscribe
	input_help_text=Your email address:
	button_text=Unsubscribe
	input_placeholder=email@example.com

email_subscriptions.name: email_subscriptions
email_subscriptions.body:
email_subscriptions header=Communication Preferences subheader_text=

If this is not your email address, please ignore this page since the email associated with this page was most likely forwarded to you.

unsubscribe_single_text=Uncheck the types of emails you do not want to receive: unsubscribe_all_text=Or check here to never receive any emails: unsubscribe_all_unsubbed_text=You are presently unsubscribed from all of our emails. Would you like to receive our emails again? unsubscribe_all_option=Unsubscribe me from all mailing lists. button_text=Update email preferences resubscribe_button_text=Yes, resubscribe me!

email_subscriptions_confirmation.name: email_subscriptions_confirmation
email_subscriptions_confirmation.body:
email_subscriptions_confirmation header=Communication Preferences subheader_text=

If this is not your email address, please ignore this page since the email associated with this page was most likely forwarded to you.

unsubscribe_all_success=You have successfully unsubscribed from all email communications. subscription_update_success=You have successfully updated your email preferences.

extends.name: extends
extends.description: Template inheritance allows you to build a base “skeleton” template that contains all the common elements of your site and defines blocks that child templates can override.

flex_area.name: flex_area
flex_area.description:
A flexible area tag is a widget container which renders its contained widgets in a box grid, 
with bootstrap layout and styling.

The layout schema is defined in a JSON structure at the content level; these tags are always empty
in their declaring templates.

flip.name: flip
flip.description: Outputs the first and second block in specified or reverse order depending on the evaluation of the condition

follow_me.name: follow_me
follow_me.description: Link your visitors to your various social pages

for.name: for
for.description: Outputs the inner content for each item in the given iterable

form.name: form
form.body:
form
	form_key=
	form_to_use=
	title=
	no_title=
	form_follow_ups_follow_up_type=no_action
	simple_email_for_live_id=
	simple_email_for_buffer_id=
	follow_up_type_simple=False
	follow_up_type_automation=False
	simple_email_campaign_id=
	form_follow_ups_workflow_id=
	response_redirect_url=
	response_redirect_id=
	response_response_type=
	response_message=
	notifications_are_overridden=False
	notifications_override_guid_buffer=
	notifications_override_guid=
	notifications_override_email_addresses=
	gotowebinar_webinar_key=
	sfdc_campaign=
form.description: Insert one of the forms created in the Form Manager

from.name: from
from.description: Alternative to the import tag that lets you import and use specific macros from one template to another

gallery.name: gallery
gallery.body:
gallery
	slides=
	loop_slides=True
	num_seconds=5
	show_pagination=True
	sizing=static
	auto_advance=True
	transition=slide
	caption_position=below
	display_mode=standard
	lightboxRows=3

global_widget.name: global_widget
global_widget.description: A global widget is one which can be shared across templates

google_search.name: google_search
google_search.body:
google_search
	prefill_input_with_pathname=False
	search_field_label=Search this site on Google
	search_button_text=Search Google
google_search.description: Allow visitors to search your site on Google

header.name: header
header.description: One line of text to be displayed in a large font size

icon.name: icon
icon.body:
icon
	name=
	set=fontawesome-5
	style=regular
	format=svg
	width=
	height=
icon.description: Render an icon from the HubSpot icon library

if.name: if
if.description: Outputs inner content if expression evaluates to true, otherwise evaluates any elif blocks, finally outputting content of any else block present

image.name: image
image.body:
image
	alt=
	width=
	height=
	align=
	hspace=
	style=
	src=

image_slider.name: image_slider
image_slider.body:
image_slider
	slides=
	loop_slides=True
	num_seconds=5
	show_pagination=True
	sizing=static
	auto_advance=True
	transition=slide
	caption_position=below
	lightbox=False
	only_thumbnails=False
	with_thumbnail_nav=False
	display_mode=standard
	version=0
	lightboxRows=3

image_src.name: image_src
image_src.description: Prints the src attribute value of an image

import.name: import
import.description: Allows you to access and use macros from a different template

include.name: include
include.description: includes multiple files in one template or stylesheet

inline_rich_text.name: inline_rich_text
inline_rich_text.description: A rich text area that can be edited inline inside modules

inline_text.name: inline_text
inline_text.description: A single line of text with no formatting that can be edited inline inside modules

layout_row.name: layout_row
layout_row.description: A LayoutRow can contain multiple LayoutSections. It has no params.

layout_section.name: layout_section
layout_section.description: A LayoutSection can contain either have multiple rows as children or multiple LayoutSection. A LayoutSection can either have children or describe a single module.

linked_image.name: linked_image
linked_image.body:
linked_image
	open_in_new_tab=False
	target=
	link=
	alt=
	width=
	height=
	align=
	hspace=
	style=
	src=
linked_image.description: Insert a linked image from File Manager.

logo.name: logo
logo.body:
logo
	suppress_company_name=False
	override_inherited_src=True
	src=
	alt=
	link=
	width=
	height=
	align=
	hspace=
	style=
	open_in_new_tab=False

macro.name: macro
macro.description: HubL macros allow you to print multiple statements with a dynamic value or values

member_login.name: member_login
member_login.body:
member_login
	email_label=Email
	password_label=Password
	remember_me_label=Remember Me
	submit_button_text=Login
	reset_password_text=Forgot your password?
	reset_password_link=/_hcms/mem/reset/request

member_register.name: member_register
member_register.body:
member_register
	email_label=Email
	password_label=Password
	password_confirm_label=Confirm Password
	submit_button_text=Save password

menu.name: menu
menu.body:
menu
	flow=horizontal
	root_type=site_root
	root_key=
	max_levels=4
	flyouts=True
	site_map_name=default
	id=

module_attribute.name: module_attribute
module_attribute.description: Defines a rich attribute for a module. Only valid within a module_block tag

password_prompt.name: password_prompt
password_prompt.body:
password_prompt submit_button_text=Submit password_placeholder=Password bad_password_message=

Sorry, please try again.
password_prompt.description: Requests a password to access a landing page.

password_reset.name: password_reset
password_reset.body:
password_reset
	password_label=Password
	password_confirm_label=Confirm Password
	submit_button_text=Save password

password_reset_request.name: password_reset_request
password_reset_request.description: Render a password reset request form.

post_filter.name: post_filter
post_filter.body:
post_filter
	select_blog=default portal blog
	expand_link_text=see all
	title_tag=h3
	list_tag=ul
	list_title=
	max_links=100
	filter_type=
post_filter.description:
Include a list of links to filter blog posts. Filter posts by tag, month, or author. 
This module can only be used in templates for: Blog Post

post_listing.name: post_listing
post_listing.body:
post_listing
	select_blog=default portal blog
	title_tag=h3
	list_tag=ul
	list_title=
	include_featured_image=False
	listing_type=recent
	max_links=100
post_listing.description:
Include a listing of links to blog posts. Order posts by date or popularity.
This module can only be used in templates for: Blog Post

print.name: print
print.description: Echos the result of the expression

raw.name: raw
raw.description: Process all inner HubL as plain text

related_blog_posts.name: related_blog_posts
related_blog_posts.body:
related_blog_posts
	blog_ids=
	blog_post_ids=
	blog_post_override=
	limit=3
	tags=
	start_date=
	end_date=
	blog_authors=
	path_prefixes=
	post_formatter=default
related_blog_posts.description: Returns a list of related blog post objects for the specified blog, sorted by relevance for the given parameters

rich_text.name: rich_text
rich_text.description: A block of text and content that can be styled with the editor.

rss_listing.name: rss_listing
rss_listing.body:
rss_listing
	show_title=True
	show_date=True
	show_author=True
	show_detail=True
	title=
	limit_to_chars=200
	publish_date_format=
	attribution_text=by
	click_through_text=Read more
	publish_date_text=posted at
	include_featured_image=False
	item_title_tag=span
	is_external=False
	number_of_items=5
	publish_date_language=en_US
	rss_url=
	content_group_id=
	tag_id=
	select_blog=default portal blog
	feed_source=

section_header.name: section_header
section_header.description: An extra large, centered, header to denote an entire section

set.name: set
set.description: Assigns the value or result of a statement to a variable

simple_menu.name: simple_menu
simple_menu.description: Simple menu, uses static link structure

social_sharing.name: social_sharing
social_sharing.body:
social_sharing
	use_page_url=False
	link=
	pinterest=
	twitter=
	google_plus=
	linked_in=
	facebook=
	email=
social_sharing.description: Allow visitors to share your page on social networks

space.name: space
space.description: Used to add an empty module for spacing to the left or right of another module in a row

style_settings.name: style_settings
style_settings.description: Provides style context from a template that will be used when a style is not defined on the content object

targeted_module_attribute.name: targeted_module_attribute
targeted_module_attribute.description: Defines a smart object parameter for a module. Only valid within a module_block tag definition.

targeted_widget_attribute.name: targeted_widget_attribute
targeted_widget_attribute.description: Defines a smart object parameter for a widget. Only valid within a widget_block tag definition.

text.name: text
text.description: A single line of text with no formatting

textarea.name: textarea
textarea.description: Creates an editable plaintext text area

unless.name: unless
unless.description: Unless is a conditional just like 'if' but works on the inverse logic.

video_player.name: video_player
video_player.body:
video_player
	player_id=
	type=iframe
	width=auto
	height=auto
	hide_playlist=True
	viral_sharing=False
	embed_button=False
	color=FFFFFF
	playlist_color=FFFFFF
	play_button_color=2A2A2A
	style=
	conversion_asset=

widget_attribute.name: widget_attribute
widget_attribute.description: Defines a rich attribute for a widget. Only valid within a widget_block tag

widget_block.name: widget_block
widget_block.description: A widget block can be used to define widget attribute values with rich content, using widget_attribute tags

widget_wrapper.name: widget_wrapper
widget_wrapper.description: Used to compile an inline widget_wrapper from code
